<li id="cite_note-Bellal2016-18"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Bellal2016_18-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFBellal2016">Bellal, Annyssa (2016). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=IfX8CgAAQBAJ&amp;pg=PA302" rel="nofollow"><i>The War Report: Armed Conflict in 2014</i></a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-20"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-20">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://ukraine.un.org/sites/default/files/2021-10/Conflict-related%20civilian%20casualties%20as%20of%2030%20September%202021%20%28rev%208%20Oct%202021%29%20EN.pdf" rel="nofollow">"Conflict-related civilian casualties in Ukraine"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Conflict-related+civilian+casualties+in+Ukraine&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fukraine.un.org%2Fsites%2Fdefault%2Ffiles%2F2021-10%2FConflict-related%2520civilian%2520casualties%2520as%2520of%252030%2520September%25202021%2520%2528rev%25208%2520Oct%25202021%2529%2520EN.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-21"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-21">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFSnyder2018">Snyder, Timothy (2018). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=l9KMDwAAQBAJ" rel="nofollow"><i>The Road to Unfreedom: Russia, Europe, America</i></a>. New York: Tim Duggan Books. p. 197. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-525-57447-7" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-525-57447-7"><bdi>978-0-525-57447-7</bdi></a>. <q>Almost everyone lost the Russo-Ukrainian war: Russia, Ukraine, the EU, the United States. The only winner was China.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=The+Road+to+Unfreedom%3A+Russia%2C+Europe%2C+America&amp;rft.place=New+York&amp;rft.pages=197&amp;rft.pub=Tim+Duggan+Books&amp;rft.date=2018&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-525-57447-7&amp;rft.aulast=Snyder&amp;rft.aufirst=Timothy&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Dl9KMDwAAQBAJ&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span>; <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFMulford2016">Mulford, Joshua P. (2016). <a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11610%2FConnections.15.2.07" rel="nofollow">"Non-State Actors in the Russo-Ukrainian War"</a>. <i>Connections</i>. <b>15</b> (2): 89107. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="cs1-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11610%2FConnections.15.2.07" rel="nofollow">10.11610/Connections.15.2.07</a></span>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/1812-1098" rel="nofollow">1812-1098</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/JSTOR_(identifier)" title="JSTOR (identifier)">JSTOR</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.jstor.org/stable/26326442" rel="nofollow">26326442</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Connections&amp;rft.atitle=Non-State+Actors+in+the+Russo-Ukrainian+War&amp;rft.volume=15&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=89-107&amp;rft.date=2016&amp;rft.issn=1812-1098&amp;rft_id=%2F%2Fwww.jstor.org%2Fstable%2F26326442%23id-name%3DJSTOR&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11610%2FConnections.15.2.07&amp;rft.aulast=Mulford&amp;rft.aufirst=Joshua+P.&amp;rft_id=%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.11610%252FConnections.15.2.07&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span>; <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFShevkoKhrul2017">Shevko, Demian; Khrul, Kristina (2017). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=MhspDwAAQBAJ&amp;pg=PA134" rel="nofollow">"Why the Conflict Between Russia and Ukraine Is a Hybrid Aggression Against the West and Nothing Else"</a>.  In Gutsul, Nazarii; Khrul, Kristina (eds.). <i>Multicultural Societies and their Threats: Real, Hybrid and Media Wars in Eastern and South-Eastern Europe</i>. Zrich: LIT Verlag Mnster. p. 100. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-3-643-90825-4" title="Special:BookSources/978-3-643-90825-4"><bdi>978-3-643-90825-4</bdi></a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.atitle=Why+the+Conflict+Between+Russia+and+Ukraine+Is+a+Hybrid+Aggression+Against+the+West+and+Nothing+Else&amp;rft.btitle=Multicultural+Societies+and+their+Threats%3A+Real%2C+Hybrid+and+Media+Wars+in+Eastern+and+South-Eastern+Europe&amp;rft.place=Z%C3%BCrich&amp;rft.pages=100&amp;rft.pub=LIT+Verlag+M%C3%BCnster&amp;rft.date=2017&amp;rft.isbn=978-3-643-90825-4&amp;rft.aulast=Shevko&amp;rft.aufirst=Demian&amp;rft.au=Khrul%2C+Kristina&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DMhspDwAAQBAJ%26pg%3DPA134&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-33"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-33">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFHall2022">Hall, Gavin E. <li id="cite_note-34"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-34">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFLeung2009">Leung, Rebecca (11 February 2009). <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20121025143917/https://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2005/01/28/60minutes/main670103.shtml" rel="nofollow">"Yushchenko: 'Live And Carry On'<span class="cs1-kern-right"></span>"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/CBS_News" title="CBS News">CBS News</a></i>. <a href="/wiki/CBS" title="CBS">CBS</a>. <li id="cite_note-35"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-35">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.kyivpost.com/article/content/ukraine-politics/study-dioxin-that-poisoned-yushchenko-made-in-lab-46417.html" rel="nofollow">"Study: Dioxin that poisoned Yushchenko made in lab"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Kyiv_Post" title="Kyiv Post">Kyiv Post</a></i>. London: Businessgroup. <a href="/wiki/Associated_Press" title="Associated Press">Associated Press</a>. 5 August 2009. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/1563-6429" rel="nofollow">1563-6429</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220131165135/https://www.kyivpost.com/article/content/ukraine-politics/study-dioxin-that-poisoned-yushchenko-made-in-lab-46417.html" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 31 January 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-Aljz01-50"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Aljz01_50-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Aljz01_50-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/europe/2014/02/ukraine-parliament-ousts-president-yanukovich-2014222152035601620.html" rel="nofollow">"Ukraine President Yanukovich impeached"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Al_Jazeera" title="Al Jazeera">Al Jazeera</a>. 22 February 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-RadioFreeEurope-51"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-RadioFreeEurope_51-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFSindelar2014">Sindelar, Daisy (23 February 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://www.rferl.org/content/was-yanukovychs-ouster-constitutional/25274346.html" rel="nofollow">"Was Yanukovych's Ouster Constitutional?"</a>. Radio Free Europe, Radio Liberty (Rferl.org)<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-2014Lessons-56"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-2014Lessons_56-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-2014Lessons_56-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-2014Lessons_56-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-2014Lessons_56-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-2014Lessons_56-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-2014Lessons_56-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFKofman2017">Kofman, Michael (2017). <a class="external text" href="https://www.rand.org/content/dam/rand/pubs/research_reports/RR1400/RR1498/RAND_RR1498.pdf" rel="nofollow"><i>Lessons from Russia's Operations in Crimea and Eastern Ukraine</i></a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-63"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-63">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source"><a class="external text" href="https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/go/643_076" rel="nofollow">"                  (/)"</a>. <i>   </i> (in Ukrainian)<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">3 February</span> 2022</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=%D0%9E%D1%84%D1%96%D1%86%D1%96%D0%B9%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9+%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB+%D0%BF%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82%D1%83+%D0%A3%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%97%D0%BD%D0%B8&amp;rft.atitle=%D0%A3%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B0+%D0%BC%D1%96%D0%B6+%D0%A3%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%97%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%8E+%D1%96+%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%96%D0%B9%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%8E+%D0%A4%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%86%D1%96%D1%94%D1%8E+%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE+%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%83%D1%81+%D1%82%D0%B0+%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8+%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B1%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8F+%D0%A7%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE+%D1%84%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%82%D1%83+%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%96%D0%B9%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%97+%D0%A4%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%86%D1%96%D1%97+%D0%BD%D0%B0+%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%96%D1%97+%D0%A3%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%97%D0%BD%D0%B8+%28%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%80%2F%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%29&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fzakon.rada.gov.ua%2Fgo%2F643_076&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-CrimeanInvasion-75"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-CrimeanInvasion_75-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-CrimeanInvasion_75-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.jhuapl.edu/Content/documents/RussianInvasionCrimeanPeninsula.pdf" rel="nofollow">"The Russian Invasion of the Crimean Peninsula 20142015"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <a href="/wiki/Johns_Hopkins_University" title="Johns Hopkins University">Johns Hopkins University</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>
<li id="cite_note-yahoo-77"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-yahoo_77-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://news.yahoo.com/armed-standoff-pro-russian-region-raises-ukraine-tension-033318395.html" rel="nofollow">"Armed men seize two airports in Ukraine's Crimea, Russia denies involvement  Yahoo News"</a>. news.yahoo.com<span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>
<li id="cite_note-78"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-78">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFBirnbaum2015">Birnbaum, Michael (15 March 2015). <a class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/europe/putin-was-surprised-at-how-easily-russia-took-control-of-crimea/2015/03/15/94b7c82e-c9c1-11e4-bea5-b893e7ac3fb3_story.html" rel="nofollow">"Putin Details Crimea Takeover Before First Anniversary"</a>. <i>The Washington Post</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-80"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-80">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://edition.cnn.com/2014/02/26/world/europe/ukraine-politics" rel="nofollow">"Russia flexes military muscle as tensions rise in Ukraine's Crimea"</a>. <li id="cite_note-81"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-81">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140226134847/https://www.kyivpost.com/content/ukraine/checkpoints-put-at-all-entrances-to-sevastopol-337655.html" rel="nofollow">"Checkpoints put at all entrances to Sevastopol"</a>. Kyiv Post. 26 February 2014. Archived from <a class="external text" href="https://www.kyivpost.com/content/ukraine/checkpoints-put-at-all-entrances-to-sevastopol-337655.html" rel="nofollow">the original</a> on 26 February 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">23 April</span> 2014</span>. <q>Checkpoints were put up at all entrances to Sevastopol last night and the borders to the city are guarded by groups of people, police units, and traffic police.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Checkpoints+put+at+all+entrances+to+Sevastopol&amp;rft.pub=Kyiv+Post&amp;rft.date=2014-02-26&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kyivpost.com%2Fcontent%2Fukraine%2Fcheckpoints-put-at-all-entrances-to-sevastopol-337655.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-de-88"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-de_88-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-de_88-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-de_88-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation report cs1" id="CITEREFKofmanMigachevaNichiporukRadin2017">Kofman, Michael; Migacheva, Katya; Nichiporuk, Brian; Radin, Andrew; Tkacheva, Olesya; Oberholtzer, Jenny (2017). <a class="external text" href="https://www.rand.org/content/dam/rand/pubs/research_reports/RR1400/RR1498/RAND_RR1498.pdf" rel="nofollow">Lessons from Russia's Operations in Crimea and Eastern Ukraine</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> (Report). </li>
<li id="cite_note-wil234-89"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-wil234_89-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFWilson2016">Wilson, Andrew (20 April 2016). "The Donbas in 2014: Explaining Civil Conflict Perhaps, but not Civil War". <i>Europe-Asia Studies</i>. <b>68</b> (4): 631652. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1080%2F09668136.2016.1176994" rel="nofollow">10.1080/09668136.2016.1176994</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0966-8136" rel="nofollow">0966-8136</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a> <a class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:148334453" rel="nofollow">148334453</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Europe-Asia+Studies&amp;rft.atitle=The+Donbas+in+2014%3A+Explaining+Civil+Conflict+Perhaps%2C+but+not+Civil+War&amp;rft.volume=68&amp;rft.issue=4&amp;rft.pages=631-652&amp;rft.date=2016-04-20&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A148334453%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft.issn=0966-8136&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1080%2F09668136.2016.1176994&amp;rft.aulast=Wilson&amp;rft.aufirst=Andrew&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-karb2-90"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-karb2_90-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation report cs1" id="CITEREFKarber2015">Karber, Phillip A. (29 September 2015). <a class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/316122469" rel="nofollow">"Lessons Learned" from the Russo-Ukrainian War</a> (Report). The Potomac Foundation.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=report&amp;rft.btitle=%22Lessons+Learned%22+from+the+Russo-Ukrainian+War&amp;rft.pub=The+Potomac+Foundation&amp;rft.date=2015-09-29&amp;rft.aulast=Karber&amp;rft.aufirst=Phillip+A.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F316122469&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-91"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-91">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFFreedman2014">Freedman, Lawrence (2 November 2014). "Ukraine and the Art of Limited War". <i>Survival</i>. <b>56</b> (6): 13. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1080%2F00396338.2014.985432" rel="nofollow">10.1080/00396338.2014.985432</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0039-6338" rel="nofollow">0039-6338</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a> <a class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:154981360" rel="nofollow">154981360</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Survival&amp;rft.atitle=Ukraine+and+the+Art+of+Limited+War&amp;rft.volume=56&amp;rft.issue=6&amp;rft.pages=13&amp;rft.date=2014-11-02&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A154981360%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft.issn=0039-6338&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1080%2F00396338.2014.985432&amp;rft.aulast=Freedman&amp;rft.aufirst=Lawrence&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-de99-92"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-de99_92-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation report cs1" id="CITEREFKofmanMigachevaNichiporukRadin2017">Kofman, Michael; Migacheva, Katya; Nichiporuk, Brian; Radin, Andrew; Tkacheva, Olesya; Oberholtzer, Jenny (2017). <a class="external text" href="https://www.rand.org/content/dam/rand/pubs/research_reports/RR1400/RR1498/RAND_RR1498.pdf" rel="nofollow">Lessons from Russia's Operations in Crimea and Eastern Ukraine</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> (Report). Santa Monica: RAND Corporation. p. 38.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=report&amp;rft.btitle=Lessons+from+Russia%27s+Operations+in+Crimea+and+Eastern+Ukraine&amp;rft.place=Santa+Monica&amp;rft.pages=38&amp;rft.pub=RAND+Corporation&amp;rft.date=2017&amp;rft.aulast=Kofman&amp;rft.aufirst=Michael&amp;rft.au=Migacheva%2C+Katya&amp;rft.au=Nichiporuk%2C+Brian&amp;rft.au=Radin%2C+Andrew&amp;rft.au=Tkacheva%2C+Olesya&amp;rft.au=Oberholtzer%2C+Jenny&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.rand.org%2Fcontent%2Fdam%2Frand%2Fpubs%2Fresearch_reports%2FRR1400%2FRR1498%2FRAND_RR1498.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-de2-93"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-de2_93-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation report cs1" id="CITEREFKofmanMigachevaNichiporukRadin2017">Kofman, Michael; Migacheva, Katya; Nichiporuk, Brian; Radin, Andrew; Tkacheva, Olesya; Oberholtzer, Jenny (2017). <a class="external text" href="https://www.rand.org/content/dam/rand/pubs/research_reports/RR1400/RR1498/RAND_RR1498.pdf" rel="nofollow">Lessons from Russia's Operations in Crimea and Eastern Ukraine</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> (Report). </li>
<li id="cite_note-jamestown-20140815-94"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-jamestown-20140815_94-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-jamestown-20140815_94-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://jamestown.org/program/strelkovgirkin-demoted-transnistrian-siloviki-strengthened-in-donetsk-peoples-republic/" rel="nofollow">"Strelkov/Girkin Demoted, Transnistrian Siloviki Strengthened in 'Donetsk People's Republic'<span class="cs1-kern-right"></span>"</a>. <i>Jamestown</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-REUeuada-95"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-REUeuada_95-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-REUeuada_95-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-REUeuada_95-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-REUeuada_95-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-ukraine-crisis-rebels-insight-idUSKBN0FW07020140727" rel="nofollow">"Pushing locals aside, Russians take top rebel posts in east Ukraine"</a>. <i>Reuters</i>. 27 July 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-107"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-107">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140727190415/https://m.censor.net.ua/resonance/295448/rossiyiskiyi_naemnik_polovina_opolchentsev_iz_rossii_mne_pomogayut_sponsory_my_vozmem_lvov" rel="nofollow">" : "    .   .   "<span class="cs1-kern-right"></span>"</a>. M.censor.net.ua. 26 July 2014. Archived from <a class="external text" href="https://m.censor.net.ua/resonance/295448/rossiyiskiyi_naemnik_polovina_opolchentsev_iz_rossii_mne_pomogayut_sponsory_my_vozmem_lvov" rel="nofollow">the original</a> on 27 July 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">26 August</span> 2014</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B9%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9+%D0%9D%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%3A+%22%D0%9F%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0+%D0%9E%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%87%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%B2+%E2%80%93+%D0%98%D0%B7+%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B8.+%D0%9C%D0%BD%D0%B5+%D0%9F%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%8E%D1%82+%D0%A1%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8B.+%D0%9C%D1%8B+%D0%92%D0%BE%D0%B7%D1%8C%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BC+%D0%9B%D1%8C%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B2%22&amp;rft.pub=M.censor.net.ua&amp;rft.date=2014-07-26&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fm.censor.net.ua%2Fresonance%2F295448%2Frossiyiskiyi_naemnik_polovina_opolchentsev_iz_rossii_mne_pomogayut_sponsory_my_vozmem_lvov&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-de3-117"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-de3_117-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation report cs1" id="CITEREFKofmanMigachevaNichiporukRadin2017">Kofman, Michael; Migacheva, Katya; Nichiporuk, Brian; Radin, Andrew; Tkacheva, Olesya; Oberholtzer, Jenny (2017). <a class="external text" href="https://www.rand.org/content/dam/rand/pubs/research_reports/RR1400/RR1498/RAND_RR1498.pdf" rel="nofollow">Lessons from Russia's Operations in Crimea and Eastern Ukraine</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> (Report). <li id="cite_note-Fedorov-118"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Fedorov_118-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFFedorov2019">Fedorov, Yury E. <li id="cite_note-karber2-119"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-karber2_119-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation report cs1" id="CITEREFKarber2015">Karber, Phillip A. <li id="cite_note-de98-120"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-de98_120-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation report cs1" id="CITEREFKofmanMigachevaNichiporukRadin2017">Kofman, Michael; Migacheva, Katya; Nichiporuk, Brian; Radin, Andrew; Tkacheva, Olesya; Oberholtzer, Jenny (2017). <a class="external text" href="https://www.rand.org/content/dam/rand/pubs/research_reports/RR1400/RR1498/RAND_RR1498.pdf" rel="nofollow">Lessons from Russia's Operations in Crimea and Eastern Ukraine</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> (Report). </li>
<li id="cite_note-LoshkariovSushentsov2016-121"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-LoshkariovSushentsov2016_121-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFLoshkariovSushentsov2016">Loshkariov, Ivan D.; Sushentsov, Andrey A. (2 January 2016). "Radicalization of Russians in Ukraine: from 'accidental' diaspora to rebel movement". <i>Southeast European and Black Sea Studies</i>. Informa UK Limited. <b>16</b> (1): 7190. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1080%2F14683857.2016.1149349" rel="nofollow">10.1080/14683857.2016.1149349</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/1468-3857" rel="nofollow">1468-3857</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a> <a class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:147321629" rel="nofollow">147321629</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Southeast+European+and+Black+Sea+Studies&amp;rft.atitle=Radicalization+of+Russians+in+Ukraine%3A+from+%27accidental%27+diaspora+to+rebel+movement&amp;rft.volume=16&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=71-90&amp;rft.date=2016-01-02&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A147321629%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft.issn=1468-3857&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1080%2F14683857.2016.1149349&amp;rft.aulast=Loshkariov&amp;rft.aufirst=Ivan+D.&amp;rft.au=Sushentsov%2C+Andrey+A.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-133"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-133">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFLuhnRoberts2014">Luhn, Alec; Roberts, Dan (23 August 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2014/aug/22/russian-convoy-crosses-border-ukraine-without-permission" rel="nofollow">"Ukraine condemns 'direct invasion' as Russian aid convoy crosses border"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Guardian" title="The Guardian">The Guardian</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-134"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-134">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFDolgov2014">Dolgov, Anna (21 November 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://www.themoscowtimes.com/2014/11/21/russias-igor-strelkov-i-am-responsible-for-war-in-eastern-ukraine-a41598" rel="nofollow">"Russia's Igor Strelkov: I Am Responsible for War in Eastern Ukraine"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Moscow_Times" title="The Moscow Times">The Moscow Times</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">11 April</span> 2015</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Moscow+Times&amp;rft.atitle=Russia%27s+Igor+Strelkov%3A+I+Am+Responsible+for+War+in+Eastern+Ukraine&amp;rft.date=2014-11-21&amp;rft.aulast=Dolgov&amp;rft.aufirst=Anna&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.themoscowtimes.com%2F2014%2F11%2F21%2Frussias-igor-strelkov-i-am-responsible-for-war-in-eastern-ukraine-a41598&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-de4-135"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-de4_135-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-de4_135-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation report cs1" id="CITEREFKofmanMigachevaNichiporukRadin2017">Kofman, Michael; Migacheva, Katya; Nichiporuk, Brian; Radin, Andrew; Tkacheva, Olesya; Oberholtzer, Jenny (2017). <a class="external text" href="https://www.rand.org/content/dam/rand/pubs/research_reports/RR1400/RR1498/RAND_RR1498.pdf" rel="nofollow">Lessons from Russia's Operations in Crimea and Eastern Ukraine</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> (Report). Santa Monica: RAND Corporation. p. 44.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=report&amp;rft.btitle=Lessons+from+Russia%27s+Operations+in+Crimea+and+Eastern+Ukraine&amp;rft.place=Santa+Monica&amp;rft.pages=44&amp;rft.pub=RAND+Corporation&amp;rft.date=2017&amp;rft.aulast=Kofman&amp;rft.aufirst=Michael&amp;rft.au=Migacheva%2C+Katya&amp;rft.au=Nichiporuk%2C+Brian&amp;rft.au=Radin%2C+Andrew&amp;rft.au=Tkacheva%2C+Olesya&amp;rft.au=Oberholtzer%2C+Jenny&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.rand.org%2Fcontent%2Fdam%2Frand%2Fpubs%2Fresearch_reports%2FRR1400%2FRR1498%2FRAND_RR1498.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-142"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-142">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFFreedman2014">Freedman, Lawrence (2 November 2014). <li id="cite_note-wil2-143"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-wil2_143-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFWilson2016">Wilson, Andrew (20 April 2016). <li id="cite_note-144"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-144">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-script cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20151208061529/https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-iac/1702643-gerashchenko_kage_shcho_rosiya_napala_na_ukraiinu_shche_24_serpnya_1968630.html" rel="nofollow"><bdi lang="uk"> ,       24    </bdi></a>. <i>ukrinform.ua</i> (in Ukrainian). <li id="cite_note-146"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-146">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140827011750/https://un.ua/eng/article/528688.html" rel="nofollow">"Poroshenko: ATO Is Ukraine's Patriotic War"</a>. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">11 April</span> 2015</span>. <q>President Petro Poroshenko considers the government's anti-terrorist operation (ATO) against separatists as Ukraine's patriotic war.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Poroshenko%3A+ATO+Is+Ukraine%27s+Patriotic+War&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fun.ua%2Feng%2Farticle%2F528688.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-147"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-147">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFGearin2014">Gearin, Mary (24 August 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://www.abc.net.au/news/2014-08-24/ukrainian-pows-marched-at-bayonet-point-through-donetsk/5692900" rel="nofollow">"Ukrainian POWs marched at bayonet-point through city"</a>. <i><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ABC_(Australia)" title="ABC (Australia)">ABC (Australia)</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-149"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-149">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-script cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140828070826/https://www.sbu.gov.ua/sbu/control/uk/publish/article?art_id=130629&amp;cat_id=39574" rel="nofollow"><bdi lang="uk">     ,           </bdi></a> [Group of Russian citizens held in Donetsk region crossed the border with weapons as part of sabotage group] (in Ukrainian). <li id="cite_note-npr-153"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-npr_153-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFSoraya_Sarhaddi_Nelson2014">Soraya Sarhaddi Nelson (26 August 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140827130939/https://www.npr.org/2014/08/26/343352054/russian-separatists-open-new-front-in-eastern-ukraine" rel="nofollow">"Russian Separatists Open New Front in Southern Ukraine"</a>. National Public Radio (NPR). Archived from <a class="external text" href="https://www.npr.org/2014/08/26/343352054/russian-separatists-open-new-front-in-eastern-ukraine" rel="nofollow">the original</a> on 27 August 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-CNBCx1-154"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-CNBCx1_154-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFKramer">Kramer, Andrew. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140828041143/https://www.cnbc.com/id/101951821" rel="nofollow">"Ukraine Says Russian Forces Lead Major New Offensive in East"</a>. CNBC. Archived from <a class="external text" href="https://www.cnbc.com/id/101951821" rel="nofollow">the original</a> on 28 August 2014. <q>Tanks, artillery and infantry have crossed from Russia into an unbreached part of eastern Ukraine in recent days, attacking Ukrainian forces and causing panic and wholesale retreat not only in this small border town but a wide swath of territory, in what Ukrainian and Western military officials are calling a stealth invasion.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Ukraine+Says+Russian+Forces+Lead+Major+New+Offensive+in+East&amp;rft.aulast=Kramer&amp;rft.aufirst=Andrew&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cnbc.com%2Fid%2F101951821&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-155"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-155">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFTsevtkova2014">Tsevtkova, Maria (26 August 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-ukraine-crisis-fighters-idUSKBN0GQ1X520140826?irpc=932" rel="nofollow">"<span class="cs1-kern-left"></span>'Men in green' raise suspicions of east Ukrainian villagers"</a>. Reuters. <q>Unidentified, heavily-armed strangers with Russian accents have appeared in an eastern Ukrainian village, arousing residents' suspicions despite Moscow's denials that its troops have deliberately infiltrated the frontier.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=%27Men+in+green%27+raise+suspicions+of+east+Ukrainian+villagers&amp;rft.date=2014-08-26&amp;rft.aulast=Tsevtkova&amp;rft.aufirst=Maria&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reuters.com%2Farticle%2Fus-ukraine-crisis-fighters-idUSKBN0GQ1X520140826%3Firpc%3D932&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-157"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-157">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFSean_CaseKlement_AndersAric_TolerEliot_Higgins">Sean Case; Klement Anders; Aric Toler; Eliot Higgins. <a class="external text" href="https://www.bellingcat.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/The-Burning-Road-to-Mariupol-FINAL-2.pdf" rel="nofollow">"The Burning Road to Mariupol"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <li id="cite_note-wiadomosci.gazeta.pl-159"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-wiadomosci.gazeta.pl_159-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-wiadomosci.gazeta.pl_159-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140903081128/https://wiadomosci.gazeta.pl/wiadomosci/1%2C114881%2C16542864%2CJaceniuk__Putin_rozpoczal_wojne_w_Europie__chcemy.html?entry=1231554" rel="nofollow">"NATO: 1000 rosyjskich onierzy dziaa na Ukrainie. <li id="cite_note-160"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-160">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-28963310" rel="nofollow">"BBC:Ukraine crisis: 'Thousands of Russians' fighting in east, August 28"</a>. <i>BBC News</i>. 28 August 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">14 October</span> 2014</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=BBC+News&amp;rft.atitle=BBC%3AUkraine+crisis%3A+%27Thousands+of+Russians%27+fighting+in+east%2C+August+28&amp;rft.date=2014-08-28&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bbc.com%2Fnews%2Fworld-europe-28963310&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-usatoday0x01-161"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-usatoday0x01_161-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/world/2014/08/28/ukraine-town-under-rebel-control/14724767/" rel="nofollow">"U.S. says Russia has 'outright lied' about Ukraine"</a>. USA Today. 28 August 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-nyp01xbb-163"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-nyp01xbb_163-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-nyp01xbb_163-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-nyp01xbb_163-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFSanderson2014">Sanderson, Bill (21 September 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://nypost.com/2014/09/21/leaked-transcripts-reveal-putins-secret-attack-in-ukraine/" rel="nofollow">"Leaked transcripts reveal Putin's secret Ukraine attack  New York Post"</a>. <i>New York Post</i>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=New+York+Post&amp;rft.atitle=Leaked+transcripts+reveal+Putin%27s+secret+Ukraine+attack+%E2%80%93+New+York+Post&amp;rft.date=2014-09-21&amp;rft.aulast=Sanderson&amp;rft.aufirst=Bill&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fnypost.com%2F2014%2F09%2F21%2Fleaked-transcripts-reveal-putins-secret-attack-in-ukraine%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-191"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-191">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://webtv.un.org/meetings-events/security-council/watch/ukraine-security-council-7311th-meeting/3888744131001" rel="nofollow">"Ukraine  Security Council, 7311th meeting"</a>. <li id="cite_note-207"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-207">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.inquisitr.com/1866019/world-war-3-vladimir-putin-plotted-ukraine-invasion-early-as-february-2014-new-report-says/" rel="nofollow">"World War 3: Vladimir Putin Plotted Ukraine Invasion Early As February 2014, New Report Says"</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-208"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-208">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-script cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source"><a class="external text" href="https://meduza.io/feature/2016/08/22/besedy-sergeya-glazieva-o-kryme-i-besporyadkah-na-vostoke-ukrainy-rasshifrovka" rel="nofollow"><bdi lang="ru"> " "       .   Meduza</bdi></a> (in Russian)<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">22 August</span> 2016</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=%D0%91%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B4%D1%8B+%22%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D1%8F+%D0%93%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B7%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B0%22+%D0%BE+%D0%9A%D1%80%D1%8B%D0%BC%D0%B5+%D0%B8+%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B4%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%85+%D0%BD%D0%B0+%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%B5+%D0%A3%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%8B.+%D0%A0%D0%B0%D1%81%D1%88%D0%B8%D1%84%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BA%D0%B0+%E2%80%94+Meduza&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fmeduza.io%2Ffeature%2F2016%2F08%2F22%2Fbesedy-sergeya-glazieva-o-kryme-i-besporyadkah-na-vostoke-ukrainy-rasshifrovka&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-221"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-221">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation audio-visual cs1" id="CITEREFOstrovsky2015">Ostrovsky, Simon (16 June 2015). <a class="external text" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2zssIFN2mso" rel="nofollow"><i>Selfie Soldiers: Russia Checks in to Ukraine</i></a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/VICE_News" title="VICE News">VICE News</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220224231100/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2zssIFN2mso" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 24 February 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>
<li id="cite_note-DW150624-222"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-DW150624_222-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFTheise2015">Theise, Eugen (24 June 2015). <a class="external text" href="https://www.dw.com/en/osce-caught-in-the-crossfire-of-the-ukraine-propaganda-war/a-18539289" rel="nofollow">"OSCE caught in the crossfire of the Ukraine propaganda war"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Deutsche_Welle" title="Deutsche Welle">Deutsche Welle</a></i>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Deutsche+Welle&amp;rft.atitle=OSCE+caught+in+the+crossfire+of+the+Ukraine+propaganda+war&amp;rft.date=2015-06-24&amp;rft.aulast=Theise&amp;rft.aufirst=Eugen&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dw.com%2Fen%2Fosce-caught-in-the-crossfire-of-the-ukraine-propaganda-war%2Fa-18539289&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-2016August-235"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-2016August_235-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-2016August_235-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFWeinberger2016">Weinberger, Kathleen (12 August 2016). <a class="external text" href="https://www.understandingwar.org/backgrounder/russian-build-and-around-ukraine-august-12-2016" rel="nofollow">"russian build-up in and around ukraine"</a>. <i>foreignpolicy</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-237"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-237">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-33003237" rel="nofollow">"Ukraine's Poroshenko warns of 'full-scale' Russia invasion"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/BBC_News" title="BBC News">BBC News</a></i>. 4 June 2015<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-238"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-238">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFBalmforthPolityuk2015">Balmforth, Richard; Polityuk, Pavel (4 June 2015).  Prentice, Alessandra (ed.). <a class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/article/ukraine-crisis-russia-poroshenko-idINKBN0OK0YA20150604" rel="nofollow">"Ukraine's Poroshenko warns of threat of "full-scale invasion" from Russia"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Reuters" title="Reuters">Reuters</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">17 November</span> 2020</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Reuters&amp;rft.atitle=Ukraine%27s+Poroshenko+warns+of+threat+of+%22full-scale+invasion%22+from+Russia&amp;rft.date=2015-06-04&amp;rft.aulast=Balmforth&amp;rft.aufirst=Richard&amp;rft.au=Polityuk%2C+Pavel&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reuters.com%2Farticle%2Fukraine-crisis-russia-poroshenko-idINKBN0OK0YA20150604&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-239"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-239">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFLarterBodner2018">Larter, David B.; Bodner, Matthew (28 November 2018). <a class="external text" href="https://www.defensenews.com/global/europe/2018/11/28/the-sea-of-azov-wont-become-the-new-south-china-sea-and-russia-knows-it/" rel="nofollow">"The Sea of Azov won't become the new South China Sea (and Russia knows it)"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Defense_News" title="Defense News">Defense News</a></i>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Defense+News&amp;rft.atitle=The+Sea+of+Azov+won%27t+become+the+new+South+China+Sea+%28and+Russia+knows+it%29&amp;rft.date=2018-11-28&amp;rft.aulast=Larter&amp;rft.aufirst=David+B.&amp;rft.au=Bodner%2C+Matthew&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.defensenews.com%2Fglobal%2Feurope%2F2018%2F11%2F28%2Fthe-sea-of-azov-wont-become-the-new-south-china-sea-and-russia-knows-it%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-251"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-251">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.stripes.com/theaters/europe/2022-02-24/173rd-Airborne-Brigade-Ukraine-Latvia-Russia-5128627.html" rel="nofollow">"173rd Airborne Brigade battalion heads to Latvia as Ukraine comes under Russian attack"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Stars_and_Stripes_(newspaper)" title="Stars and Stripes (newspaper)">Stars and Stripes</a></i>. 24 February 2022. <a class="external text" href="https://ghostarchive.org/archive/20220226/https://www.stripes.com/theaters/europe/2022-02-24/173rd-Airborne-Brigade-Ukraine-Latvia-Russia-5128627.html" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 26 February 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>
<li id="cite_note-Zsymbol-252"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Zsymbol_252-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFSchogol2022">Schogol, Jeff (22 February 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://taskandpurpose.com/analysis/russian-military-equipment-white-markings/" rel="nofollow">"Here's what those mysterious white 'Z' markings on Russian military equipment may mean"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Task_%26_Purpose" title="Task &amp; Purpose">Task &amp; Purpose</a></i>. North Equity. <a class="external text" href="https://ghostarchive.org/archive/20220227/https://taskandpurpose.com/analysis/russian-military-equipment-white-markings/" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 27 February 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">27 February</span> 2022</span>. <q>[B]ottom line is the 'Z' markings (and others like it) are a deconfliction measure to help prevent fratricide, or friendly fire incidents.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=Task+%26+Purpose&amp;rft.atitle=Here%27s+what+those+mysterious+white+%27Z%27+markings+on+Russian+military+equipment+may+mean&amp;rft.date=2022-02-22&amp;rft.aulast=Schogol&amp;rft.aufirst=Jeff&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Ftaskandpurpose.com%2Fanalysis%2Frussian-military-equipment-white-markings%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-denials-253"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-denials_253-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFTaylor2022">Taylor, Adam (24 February 2022). <span class="cs1-lock-subscription" title="Paid subscription required"><a class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2022/02/24/ukraine-russia-denials/" rel="nofollow">"Russia's attack on Ukraine came after months of denials it would attack"</a></span>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Washington_Post" title="The Washington Post">The Washington Post</a></i>. Photograph by <a href="/wiki/Evgeniy_Maloletka" title="Evgeniy Maloletka">Evgeniy Maloletka</a> (<a href="/wiki/Associated_Press" title="Associated Press">Associated Press</a>). <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Nash_Holdings" title="Nash Holdings">Nash Holdings</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0190-8286" rel="nofollow">0190-8286</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/OCLC_(identifier)" title="OCLC (identifier)">OCLC</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/2269358" rel="nofollow">2269358</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.today/20220224205233/https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2022/02/24/ukraine-russia-denials/" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 24 February 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">26 February</span> 2022</span>. <q>On Sunday ... "There is no invasion. There is no such plans," Antonov said.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Washington+Post&amp;rft.atitle=Russia%27s+attack+on+Ukraine+came+after+months+of+denials+it+would+attack&amp;rft.date=2022-02-24&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F2269358&amp;rft.issn=0190-8286&amp;rft.aulast=Taylor&amp;rft.aufirst=Adam&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.washingtonpost.com%2Fworld%2F2022%2F02%2F24%2Fukraine-russia-denials%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-254"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-254">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.cbsnews.com/news/russia-ukraine-putin-invasion-after-denials-now-says-no-occupation-plan" rel="nofollow">"Putin attacked Ukraine after insisting for months there was no plan to do so. Now he says there's no plan to take over"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/CBS_News" title="CBS News">CBS News</a></i>. <a href="/wiki/Kharkiv" title="Kharkiv">Kharkiv</a>: <a href="/wiki/CBS" title="CBS">CBS</a> (published 22 February 2022). 24 February 2022. <a class="external text" href="https://ghostarchive.org/archive/20220227/https://www.cbsnews.com/news/russia-ukraine-putin-invasion-after-denials-now-says-no-occupation-plan" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 27 February 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">26 February</span> 2022</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=CBS+News&amp;rft.atitle=Putin+attacked+Ukraine+after+insisting+for+months+there+was+no+plan+to+do+so.+Now+he+says+there%27s+no+plan+to+take+over.&amp;rft.date=2022-02-24&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cbsnews.com%2Fnews%2Frussia-ukraine-putin-invasion-after-denials-now-says-no-occupation-plan&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-255"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-255">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFHarrisSonne2021">Harris, Shane; Sonne, Paul (3 December 2021). <span class="cs1-lock-subscription" title="Paid subscription required"><a class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/national-security/russia-ukraine-invasion/2021/12/03/98a3760e-546b-11ec-8769-2f4ecdf7a2ad_story.html" rel="nofollow">"Russia planning massive military offensive against Ukraine involving 175,000 troops, U.S. intelligence warns"</a></span>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Washington_Post" title="The Washington Post">The Washington Post</a></i>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Nash_Holdings" title="Nash Holdings">Nash Holdings</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-diditmatter-256"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-diditmatter_256-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-diditmatter_256-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFMerchant2022">Merchant, Normaan (25 February 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/russia-ukraine-vladimir-putin-business-europe-8acc2106b95554429e93dfee5e253743" rel="nofollow">"US intel predicted Russia's invasion plans. <li id="cite_note-Abbruzzese_2022-265"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Abbruzzese_2022_265-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Abbruzzese_2022_265-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFAbbruzzese2022">Abbruzzese, Jason (24 February 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/live-blog/russia-ukraine-conflict-live-updates-n1289655/ncrd1289673" rel="nofollow">"Putin says he is fighting a resurgence of Nazism. <li id="cite_note-auto1-266"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-auto1_266-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-auto1_266-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFCampbell2022">Campbell, Eric (3 March 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://www.abc.net.au/news/2022-03-03/inside-the-separatist-republic-that-triggered-the-war-in-ukraine/100871262" rel="nofollow">"Inside Donetsk, the separatist republic that triggered the war in Ukraine"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Australian_Broadcasting_Corporation" title="Australian Broadcasting Corporation">Australian Broadcasting Corporation</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>
<li id="cite_note-Waxman_2022-267"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Waxman_2022_267-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation magazine cs1" id="CITEREFWaxman2022">Waxman, Olivia B. (3 March 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://time.com/6154493/denazification-putin-ukraine-history-context/" rel="nofollow">"Historians on What Putin Gets Wrong About 'Denazification' in Ukraine"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Time_(magazine)" title="Time (magazine)">Time</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">6 March</span> 2022</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Time&amp;rft.atitle=Historians+on+What+Putin+Gets+Wrong+About+%27Denazification%27+in+Ukraine&amp;rft.date=2022-03-03&amp;rft.aulast=Waxman&amp;rft.aufirst=Olivia+B.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Ftime.com%2F6154493%2Fdenazification-putin-ukraine-history-context%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-268"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-268">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFBerger2022">Berger, Miriam (24 February 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2022/02/24/putin-denazify-ukraine/" rel="nofollow">"Putin says he will 'denazify' Ukraine. </li>
<li id="cite_note-280"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-280">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFSmith2022">Smith, Alexander (18 February 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/world/warning-siren-sounds-in-rebel-held-capital-in-east-ukraine-reuters-witness/ar-AAU29BV?ocid=entnewsntp" rel="nofollow">"Warning siren sounds in rebel-held capital in east Ukraine -Reuters witness"</a>. <i><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/MSN_News" title="MSN News">MSN News</a></i>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220224032724/https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/world/warning-siren-sounds-in-rebel-held-capital-in-east-ukraine-reuters-witness/ar-AAU29BV?ocid=entnewsntp" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 24 February 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-Hodge_2022-293"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Hodge_2022_293-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFHodge2022">Hodge, Nathan (26 February 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://edition.cnn.com/europe/live-news/ukraine-russia-news-02-22-22/h_59a413ce984eda5954ce5b9c4655bcc5" rel="nofollow">"Russia's Federation Council gives consent to Putin on use of armed forces abroad, Russian agencies report"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/CNN" title="CNN">CNN</a></i>. <li id="cite_note-306"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-306">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.themoscowtimes.com/2022/02/23/kremlin-says-ukraine-rebels-have-asked-russia-for-help-against-kyiv-a76548" rel="nofollow">"Kremlin Says Ukraine Rebels Have Asked Russia for 'Help' Against Kyiv"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Moscow_Times" title="The Moscow Times">The Moscow Times</a></i>. 23 February 2022. <a class="external text" href="https://ghostarchive.org/archive/20220227/https://www.themoscowtimes.com/2022/02/23/kremlin-says-ukraine-rebels-have-asked-russia-for-help-against-kyiv-a76548" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 27 February 2022.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Moscow+Times&amp;rft.atitle=Kremlin+Says+Ukraine+Rebels+Have+Asked+Russia+for+%27Help%27+Against+Kyiv&amp;rft.date=2022-02-23&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.themoscowtimes.com%2F2022%2F02%2F23%2Fkremlin-says-ukraine-rebels-have-asked-russia-for-help-against-kyiv-a76548&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-UkNGOSW15713-337"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-UkNGOSW15713_337-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-UkNGOSW15713_337-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="external text" href="https://www.osw.waw.pl/en/publikacje/osw-commentary/2013-07-15/kyiv-s-gas-strategy-closer-cooperation-gazprom-or-a-genuine-div" rel="nofollow">Kyiv's gas strategy: closer cooperation with Gazprom or a genuine diversification</a> <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131023132057/https://www.osw.waw.pl/en/publikacje/osw-commentary/2013-07-15/kyiv-s-gas-strategy-closer-cooperation-gazprom-or-a-genuine-div" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> 23 October 2013 at the <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a>, <a href="/wiki/Centre_for_Eastern_Studies" title="Centre for Eastern Studies">Centre for Eastern Studies</a> (15 July 2013)</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-338"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-338">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-29521564" rel="nofollow">"Russia's gas fight with Ukraine"</a>. <i>BBC News</i>. 31 October 2014.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=BBC+News&amp;rft.atitle=Russia%27s+gas+fight+with+Ukraine&amp;rft.date=2014-10-31&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bbc.com%2Fnews%2Fworld-europe-29521564&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-355"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-355">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFShalal2021">Shalal, Andrea (20 July 2021). <a class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/us-germany-announce-deal-nord-stream-2-pipeline-coming-days-sources-2021-07-19/" rel="nofollow">"Germany to announce deal on Nord Stream 2 pipeline in coming days -sources"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Reuters" title="Reuters">Reuters</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">17 August</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=Reuters&amp;rft.atitle=Germany+to+announce+deal+on+Nord+Stream+2+pipeline+in+coming+days+-sources&amp;rft.date=2021-07-20&amp;rft.aulast=Shalal&amp;rft.aufirst=Andrea&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reuters.com%2Fbusiness%2Fenergy%2Fus-germany-announce-deal-nord-stream-2-pipeline-coming-days-sources-2021-07-19%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Russia_and_the_Menace_of_Unreality-370"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Russia_and_the_Menace_of_Unreality_370-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Russia_and_the_Menace_of_Unreality_370-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFPomerantsev2014">Pomerantsev, Peter (9 September 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/international/archive/2014/09/russia-putin-revolutionizing-information-warfare/379880/" rel="nofollow">"Russia and the Menace of Unreality"</a>. <i>The Atlantic</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">19 February</span> 2022</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Atlantic&amp;rft.atitle=Russia+and+the+Menace+of+Unreality&amp;rft.date=2014-09-09&amp;rft.aulast=Pomerantsev&amp;rft.aufirst=Peter&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.theatlantic.com%2Finternational%2Farchive%2F2014%2F09%2Frussia-putin-revolutionizing-information-warfare%2F379880%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>

Retrieved <span class="nowrap">19 February</span> 2022</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Los+Angeles+Times&amp;rft.atitle=Russian+disinformation+kicks+into+high+gear+as+Ukraine+crisis+drags+on&amp;rft.date=2022-02-17&amp;rft.aulast=Bulos&amp;rft.aufirst=Nabih&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.latimes.com%2Fworld-nation%2Fstory%2F2022-02-17%2Frussia-ukraine-disinformation-campaign&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-387"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-387">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFAntonova2022">Antonova, Natalia (1 June 2022). <a class="external text" href="https://www.thebulwark.com/the-death-cult-keeping-russia-in-ukraine/" rel="nofollow">"The 'Death Cult' Keeping Russia in Ukraine"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Bulwark_(website)" title="The Bulwark (website)">The Bulwark</a></i>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Bulwark&amp;rft.atitle=The+%27Death+Cult%27+Keeping+Russia+in+Ukraine&amp;rft.date=2022-06-01&amp;rft.aulast=Antonova&amp;rft.aufirst=Natalia&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thebulwark.com%2Fthe-death-cult-keeping-russia-in-ukraine%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Herald-401"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Herald_401-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Herald_401-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFScislowskaPablo_GorondiKarel_JanicekJovana_Gec2014">Scislowska; Pablo Gorondi; Karel Janicek; Jovana Gec; Corneliu Rusnac (12 March 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://thechronicleherald.ca/world/1193466-russian-aggression-unnerves-other-neighbours" rel="nofollow">"Russian aggression unnerves other neighbours"</a>. <i>The Chronicle Herald</i>. <li id="cite_note-NTI-402"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-NTI_402-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-NTI_402-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.nti.org/gsn/article/baltic-states-want-stronger-defenses-face-russian-incursion-ukraine/" rel="nofollow">"Russia's Neighbors Want Stronger Defenses After Ukraine Incursion"</a>. <i>Global Security Newswire</i>. 7 March 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>
<li id="cite_note-Gearan-403"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Gearan_403-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1" id="CITEREFGearan2014">Gearan, Anne (1 April 2014). <a class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/europe/nato-sees-no-evidence-russia-pulling-back-troops-from-ukrainian-border/2014/04/01/eea9b6fe-b99f-11e3-96ae-f2c36d2b1245_story.html" rel="nofollow">"NATO chief recommits to defending Eastern European, Baltic nations"</a>. <i>The Washington Post</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">1 April</span> 2014</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Washington+Post&amp;rft.atitle=NATO+chief+recommits+to+defending+Eastern+European%2C+Baltic+nations&amp;rft.date=2014-04-01&amp;rft.aulast=Gearan&amp;rft.aufirst=Anne&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.washingtonpost.com%2Fworld%2Feurope%2Fnato-sees-no-evidence-russia-pulling-back-troops-from-ukrainian-border%2F2014%2F04%2F01%2Feea9b6fe-b99f-11e3-96ae-f2c36d2b1245_story.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ARusso-Ukrainian+War"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-IRI14OCT-417"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-IRI14OCT_417-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-IRI14OCT_417-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-IRI14OCT_417-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation pressrelease cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20141016232411/https://www.iri.org/news-events-press-center/news/iri-ukraine-pre-election-poll-shows-strong-opposition-russian-aggressi" rel="nofollow">"IRI Ukraine pre-election poll shows strong opposition to Russian aggression, support for Kyiv Government"</a> (Press release).
